ValidationRule.description: Require license end date notes if the license end date is changed after the opportunity is closed won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($User.FirstName = 'Netsuite') && NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption) && NOT(ISBLANK(ContractId)) && TEXT(StageName) = "Closed Won" && (ISCHANGED( License_Term__c ) || ISCHANGED ( License_End_Date__c )) && ISBLANK(License_End_Date_Notes__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter license end date notes for why this date is changing after the opportunity is closed won.
